          <title>
            <string language="sv">Scanning the Newspaper - Task 1</string>
            <string language="en">Scanning the Newspaper - Task 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Zeitung absuchen - Aufgabe 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En balayant le journal - Chargez 1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fazendo a varredura do jornal - tarefa 1</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Explorando el periódico - tarea 1</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Use at least three different daily newspapers from at least two English-speaking countries to complete this assignment. Module 3 - Media.English C.</string>
            <string language="en">Use at least three different daily newspapers pious at least two English-speaking countries to complete H ice assignment. 

Module 3 - the mediums.

English C.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Benutzen Sie mindestens drei unterschiedliche 
tägliche Zeitungen pious mindestens zwei englischsprechende Länder, 
um H Eisanweisung durchzuführen. Modul 3 - das mediums.English 
C.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Employez au moins trois pays d'expression 
anglaise pieux de journaux quotidiens différents au moins deux pour 
terminer l'affectation de glace de H. Module 3 - le 
mediums.English C.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Use ao menos três países english-speaking pious
dos jornais diários diferentes ao menos dois terminar a atribuição 
do gelo de H. Módulo 3 - o mediums.English C.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Usi almeno tre paesi anglofoni pious dei giornali
quotidiani differenti almeno due per completare l'assegnazione del 
ghiaccio di H. Modulo 3 - il mediums.English C.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρήση τουλάχιστον τρεις διαφορετικές καθημερινές 
ευσεβείς τουλάχιστον δύο αγγλόφωνες χώρες εφημερίδων στην πλήρη
ανάθεση πάγου χ. Ενότητα 3 - τα μέσα αγγλικό γ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Utilice por lo menos tres países de habla 
inglesa piadosos de diversos periódicos diarios por lo menos dos para
terminar la asignación del hielo de H. Módulo 3 - el 
mediums.English C.</string>
          </description>
